basics.name: Yew Jin Lim
basics.label: Director of Engineering
basics.summary: Director of Engineering at Google leading Notifications and Proactive AI, focused on innovating Search products through Gen AI, ML, and generally decent engineering

work.name: Google
work.position: Director of Engineering, Notifications and Proactive AI Lead
work.summary: Leading the Notifications and Proactive AI organization at Google's Search Discovery
highlights: Lead innovative Search products using cutting-edge AI technology
Build innovative Search proactive products and features leveraging GenAI platforms
Drive development of systems to keep users informed by digesting world's information
Enable users to effortlessly use Gen AI to meet their daily needs

work.name: Google
work.position: Principal Software Engineer, Search Growth Engineering Lead
work.summary: Led development of predictive systems and growth initiatives for Google Search
highlights: Led development of predictive systems for ranking and triggering of proactive features
Drove Google Search usage growth through sustainable user acquisition
Led the Intent Prediction team of 50 members
Developed frameworks for user information interests and timing optimization

work.name: Google
work.position: Software Engineer to Senior Staff Software Engineer
work.summary: Led key search and language initiatives
highlights: Led proactive search initiatives using personalized signals
Led spelling correction and CLIR teams
Developed revolutionary web-scale contextual spell checker
System caught 38+ errors in professionally edited manuscripts

publications.name: Predicting intent of a search for a particular context
Predicting user needs for a particular context
On Forward Pruning in Game-Tree Search
Variational Bayesian approach to movie rating prediction
